data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Maguindanao, Philippines to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maguindanao, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 163,536 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Maguindanao.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Maguindanao who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Manobo, Cotabato people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Manobo, Cotabato people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Maguindanao, Philippines.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Maguindanao, Philippines today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maguindanao, Philippines has a population of 1,174,000.

We estimate Maguindanao has 163,536 people who might know Jesus, 904,397 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 106,067 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Maguindanao, Philippines to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
